title: Decision-Making Simulation Under Time Pressure: Probability-Based Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic probability concepts and decision-making processes
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented learning environment using smartphone-based VR simulations, reconstructing decision-making processes of medical/legal/technical experts for elementary-level comprehension.

learning_goals: Perform decision-making with over 80% accuracy using probabilistic information under time pressure
Identify and explain heuristic processing in four types of decision-making scenarios with over 70% accuracy
Analyze and describe the impact of time pressure on performance from three perspectives through simulation-based assessment tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
